channel.title: Run server error (667)
channel.description:
PLEASE HELP! I'm having troubles running my server. It's giving me a cache.java error and closes right away. Heres a pic:
[img]http://i958.photobucket.com/albums/ae65/Rigsy_2010/Untitled-24.png[/img]
Note: I was able to take a quick screenshot of the picture beforee it closed , So it's pretty transparent.

item.title: Run server error (667)
item.dc:creator: @vlad1 vlad1
item.description:
@vlad1 wrote:

startcode:

put the cache in the data folder and in the run code, add “pause” at the bottom, this will make that the screen doesn’t close right away

THanks for posing this,may help him alot.
Also how do I run the client,It stops at 1% >:[.

Read full topic
